name: Advanced Therapy Massage Lotion
description:
Hypoallergenic lotion that penetrates the skin for a pleasant, non-greasy finish. Gentle drag, lasting performance for less reapplications and a deep, relaxing massage. Advanced Therapy Lotion is unscented, and made with Apricot, Grapeseed and Sesame oils.

Features:
Hypoallergenic, Paraben-free, gentle drag and lasting performance.
Use with 1 gallon bottle pump www.biotone.com

Key Ingredients:
Apricot Oil, Sesame oil, Grapeseed Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Grapeseed Extract, Hypoallergenic, Unscented 
Size: 1 gallon

name: Advanced Therapy Massage Gel 1 Gallon
description:
Hypoallergenic. Provides 25% more coverage than ordinary oils yet it's remarkably light, lasting and non-greasy. Spreading effortlessly over the skin, this seed oil based gel has one of the lightest, most pleasant textures you'll find. Offers significantly more coverage than typical oils, so you use much less, yet assures continuous workability that doesn't require the interruption of reapplication. An ideal choice for those who want the lightest of oil textures. Water-dispersible. Leaves no greasy residue.

Key ingredients
Apricot Oil, Sesame Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil Ester, Vitamin E, Hypoallergenic, Unscented, Hypoallergenic.

Light texture, this seed-oil based gel offers up to 25% more coverage than typical oils, so you use much less. Water-dispersible with Worry-Free washout. Pump recommended. Paraben-free.

name: Clear Results Massage Oil
description:
Clear Results Oil's exclusive formula offers light, lasting glide with smooth workability. Features Aloe and Jojoba Oils for deep, nourishing skin care. Independent tests show Clear Results to easily wash out of fabrics to keep sheets, linens and aprons looking their best. 

Features:
Easy Wash Out
Made with Aloe and Jojoba Oils
Use with 1 gallon bottle pump

Key Ingredients:
Coconut Oil Ester, Jojoba Oil, Aloe Vera Oil, Unscented

Size: 1 Gal

name: Herbal Select Body Therapy Massage Oil 1 Gallon
description:
Enjoy a remarkably satiny glide that doesn't leave any unpleasant oily residue with this blend of specially selected vegetable oils. So finely textured, it envelopes the skin in a veil of velvety smooth, silky-light moisture. Active botanical extracts include Arnica to stimulate circulation, Hawaiian White Ginger to relieve soreness, Bayberry to tone and cleanse, and Violet to calm. 

Key ingredients
Jojoba Oil, Sesame Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Apricot, Active Botanicals of Arnica, Hawaiian White Ginger, Bayberry, and Violet, Aloe Vera Oil, Paraben-Free.

Gel-textured feel without oily residue. Arnica, Hawaiian White Ginger, Bayberry and Violet Leaf stimulate circulation, relieve soreness, soothe and calm. Great glide over dense body hair.

name: 1 Gallon Bottle Pump
description:
Enjoy easy dispensing of your favorite oils, gels and lotions. Fits most 1 gallon BIOTONE oils, gels and lotions. 

Compatible with:
Advanced Therapy Lotion, Herbal-Select Body Oils, Deep-Tissue Lotions, Clear Results Oils and other 1-Gallon size oils, gels and lotions. 
Not compatible with massage cremes.

This item is non-refundable.

name: Herbal Select Face Therapy Massage Lotion
description:
Use for face, eye, and neck areas. This soothing face therapy lotion contains the finest ingredients you'll find in massage lotions. Use it with confidence on all skin types- the unique blend of light emollients and natural botanicals assures comfort and glide throughout the facial massage. Leaves skin radiant. Contains skin-smoothing White Lily and Rosehips with anti-aging Vitamin C, Cucumber and Papaya.

Key Ingredients:
Active Botanicals of White lily, Rosehips, English Cucumber, Papaya, Aloe Vera Oil

Size: 6 oz

name: Herbal Select Foot Therapy Massage Lotion - 8 oz
description:
This cooling, energizing, skin-softening formula is a treat for tired, sore feet. This all-in-one foot therapy lotion soothes even the most overworked feet. Satiny texture is non-greasy and fast absorbing- lets you massage deeply from heel to toe. Botanicals of cooling Peppermint eases burning, Rosemary stimulates circulation, Bay Laurel helps inhibit bacteria and Lemon Peel adds healing comfort. Also contains softening agents to moisturize rough, callused skin.

Key Ingredients:
Jojoba Oil, Sesame Oil, Grapeseed oil, Active Botanicals of Peppermint, Rosemary, Bay Laurel, Lemon Peel; Aloe Vera Oil, Vitamin E

Size: 8 oz

name: Cocoa-Comfort Massage Lotion
description:
Cocoa-Comfort Massage Lotion is made with real Cocoa-Butter, nature's ultimate hydrator, to soothe & balance the skin, and enhance its texture and tone. Developed for use in all modalities, Cocoa-Comfort Massage Lotion offers longer workability, less reapplication, is non-greasy and paraben-free. Made with Avocado Oils, Soy Oils and Aloe Vera.

Key Ingredients:
Cocoa-Butter, Avocado oil, Soy oil, Aloe Vera oil 

Size: 8 oz

name: Milk & Honey Hydrating Lotion
description:
Warm, addictive comfort. Infused with milk proteins, honey, royal jelly and clover blossom. Fortified with deeply hydrating wheat amino acids, nourishing shea butter, healing and protecting beta glucan and the replenishing oils of jojoba, avocado, peach and sunflower. This light, silky, all-over body hydrator nourishes skin and protects against daily damage and dryness. Leaves skin soft, smooth and lightly fragrant. 

Our original Milk & Honey inspires memories of sweet, happy celebrations.

Key fragrance notes:
Vanilla
Milk
Honey

Key Ingredients:
Blend of Jojoba, Avocado, Peach and Sunflower oils; Shea Butter, Vegetable Glycerin, Wheat Amino Acid, Hydrating Beta-Glucan; Essential Oils and Extracts of Honey, Milk Glycerides, Clover Blossom and Royal Jelly
 
Size: 8 fl oz

name: Green Tea & Lime Leaf Hydrating Lotion
description:
Herbal with a twist. Infused with green tea, lime leaf, bamboo, fo-ti root, lemongrass and ginger. Fortified with deeply hydrating wheat amino acids, nourishing shea butter, healing and protecting beta glucan and the replenishing oils of jojoba, avocado, peach and sunflower. This light, silky, all-over body hydrator nourishes skin and protects against daily damage and dryness. Leaves skin soft, smooth and lightly fragrant.

Our exclusive Green Tea & Lime Leaf is inspired by the luxurious textures and fragrances of the orient in a natural blend of exotic botanicals.

Key fragrance notes:
Lemongrass
Ginger
Japanese Green Tea

Key Ingredients:
Blend of Jojoba, Avocado, Peach and Sunflower Oils; Shea Butter, Vegetable Glycerin, Wheat Amino Acid, Hydrating Beta Glucan; Essential Oils and Extracts of Japanese Green Tea, Bamboo, Ginger, Lemongrass and Lime Leaf 

Size: 8 fl oz

name: Polar Lotion 4oz Tube
description:
NEW SIZE! - Nothing soothes as quickly or as thoroughly as Polar Lotion - a new therapeutic lotion that brings long-lasting, deep-cooling relief to your massage. Fast-penetrating, it immediately quiets aching, inflamed, or sore areas to bring overall comfort. Ideal for sports training, physical therapy, or combined with a stretching program. Non-lingering aroma.

Features:
6% menthol, for cooling pain relief
Convenient tube, great for athletes and traveling.
Aloe Vera Oil
Herbal Extracts of Eucalyptus, Peppermint and Lavender

Key Ingredients:
Menthol, Natural Glycerine, Aloe Vera Oil, Essential Oil of Wintergreen, Extracts of Rosemary, Lavender, Juniper, Peppermint and Eucalyptus
 
Size: 4 oz

name: Bottle Holster
description: Bottle Holster comes with a belt that adjusts up to 40" with an easy-lock clip buckle. Includes an empty 8 oz bottle with pump, ready to use. Now in Black for a sleek look. THIS ITEM IS NON-REFUNDABLE.

name: Jar Holster
description: Jar Holster comes with a belt that adjusts up to 40" with an easy-lock clip buckle and a support band to ensure jar placement. Includes an empty 4 oz jar with lid, ready to use. Now in Black for a sleek look.

name: Golden Touch Oil Warmer
description:
Make your client even happier by warming your favorite oil, gel, or lotion.

Unlike other warmers that give limited heat settings, the Golden Touch has a fully adjustable temperature range.
This Golden Touch Oil Warmer is durable and easy to clean.
The Golden Touch will warm any standard 8 oz. bottle to the temperature of your choice.
Remember, warmth makes the difference!

- Warms oils, gels, and lotions
- Fully adjustable temperature gauge
- Industrial heating unit guaranteed 5 years
- Holds all standard 8 oz bottles up to 2" in diameter
- Durable electrostatic finish makes it easy to clean
- Dimensions: 5.25'' x 4.3'' x 5.75'' Weight: 2.45 lbs.

name: Rolling Massage Therapy Stool
description: Easy mobility around your massage table. This rolling stool is the perfect compliment to any massage table. Convenient gas spring makes raising and lowering of the stool height simple. It is especially helpful in Reiki and energy massage and reflexology.

name: Desktop Massage Support
description:
The desktop massage support is the perfect way to cope with the limitations of performing bodywork and healing arts at off-site locations with limited spaces such as offices, nursing homes, and in-patient healthcare facilities. With its fast, easy setup and take down, the desktop massage support is ideal for both the on-the-go bodyworkers and clients. The counter-balanced frame easily sits on any desk or table, and its numerous adjustable components give every client perfect comfort.

Many therapists and bodyworkers preferably use massage equipment for clients who are wheelchair-bound, bedridden, geriatric, and recovering from eye surgery. As usual, our desktop massage support comes with a free carrying case. Due to the lightweight, compact design, it takes up a minimal amount of space and can reduce the need to transport a massage table or chair.

name: Ergo BodyChoice Chair
description:
FEATURES AND BENEFITS:
2-INCH SMALL-CELL FOAM increases the level of client comfort by absorbing their body's weight
ERGO HEADREST gives ergonomically-designed face and head support
HEADREST PILLOW greatly reduces pressure on the face by completely absorbing the weight of the head
300 LB DYNAMIC WORKING WEIGHT for accommodating clients of all sizes
QUICK-LOCK FOLDING SYSTEM for opening and folding of massage chair in seconds 
PU LEATHER offers a super-soft, oil and water proof, environmentally friendly surface

Specifications	Ergo BodyChoice Chair
Weight	21 lbs
Static Weight	1,200 lbs
Dynamic Weight	300 lbs
Upholstry	2 inches small-cell foam including 0.8inches memory foam
Vinyl	PU vinyl , oil and water proof
Leg & Frame	Metal frame
System	Quick lock system for opening and folding in seconds
Guarantee	2 years against defects in manufacturer??s materials and workmanship

name: Master Chair
description:
The Master Chair can be set up and taken down in a matter of seconds, and is an outstanding investment for the busy bodyworker on the go.

Specifications	Master Chair
Weight	20 lbs
Static Weight	1,200 lbs
Dynamic Weight	300 lbs
Upholstry	2" small cell foam
Vinyl	Oil & waterproof

name: Ergo Pro Portable Massage Chair Package
description:
Everything you need in one great package! The Ergo Pro Massage Chair is ergonomically designed to provide proper alignment and comfort for you and your client. 

The Ergo Pro chair is the only chair on the market co-designed along with David Palmer, the Father of Contemporary Chair Massage and Founder of Touchpro.com. David says," after training over 11,000 practitioners we know massage chairs and the Ergo-Pro is our exclusive choice!"

name: Massage Table & Chair Combo
description:
Key Features of Ergo Pro Chair
• Durable semi-gloss silver aluminum frame holds 1200 pounds static weight; 600 pounds working weight
• Lightweight (only 19 lbs.)
• Telescoping legs adjust to therapist's height alignment and comfort
• One-step adjustments on face rest, arm support and chest pad allow quick versatile positioning
• Optimum-sized chest pad provides comfort for petite and large clients
• Comfortably seats clients 4'6" to 6'6"
• Offset nylon wheels make toting easy
• Clever hidden pouch holds client's glasses and jewelry
• Removable knee pads and adjustable seat allow work on clients with sensitive knees
• Adjustable seat permits reversing the client for leg, foot, or anterior torso work.
• Available in your choice of Royal Blue, Burgundy, Teal or Black soft, leather-like SatinTouch upholstery.
• Limited Lifetime Warranty

Key Features of the Versalite Pro
The package includes:
• 2 1/4", two-layer foam system for long-lasting comfort 
• Satin touch upholstery available in Black, Royal Blue, Burgundy, and Teal Green 
• Full-size 30"W x 73"L
• Lightweight, approximately 27 lbs. 
• Telescoping legs adjust for quick height changes from 23" to 33" 
• Plenty of leg room for the practitioner 
• Super stable - won't tilt when weight shifts to one end 
• 450 LB drop test 
• 750 LB working weight 
• Limited Lifetime Warranty!

name: Eco-BodyChoice Massage Table
description:
The Eco-BodyChoice massage table is not merely a great bargain during this sluggish economy, but this portable model still comes complete with all functional components. Its structural system is made of first-rate German beech to ensure professional strength. The double-lock leg adjusters are also included for additional stability and security. Furthermore, this newest BodyChoice series is equipped with the Quick-Lock system for streamlined folding and opening of the table in just seconds. The upholstery is comprised of two-inch thick high density small-cell foam padding and oil & water-proof, soft and environmentally-friendly PU leather.

•	Free Adjustable Headrest
•	Free Face Pillow
•	Free Hanging Armshelf
•	Free Deluxe Carring Case

Vinyl - Environmentally and Skin Friendly PU-Leather (Oil & Waterproof)

System	Auto Lock Frame & Leg System for Opening and Folding in Seconds
Double Lock Leg Adjusters for Life-Long Stability and More Security

name: TT Multipurpose Master Heated Top Massage Table
description:
TT Multipurpose Master are true indulgences in the world of massage tables! Our unique 11-position elevating back rest provides for angle comfort to your customized specifications.
Reiki panels, Shiatsu cable release, our custom comfort 6-way adjustable Face Cradle, and our patented Thermo Top built-in heated system are more creature comforts available to you in the TT Multipurpose Master just to name a few!

Signature Ten-Year Guarantee Against Defects of Legs & Frame
11-position elevating back rest 
Adjustable Face Cradle with Face Cushion 
Therma Top built-in heating system
Patented Auto-Lock leg opening system 
Reiki leg panels are double the thickness of normal leg panels for added strength 
Shiatsu cable release 
Oil and waterproof, CFC-free upholstery with strong denim-like reinforcement backing for extra durability 
An arm shelf that is fully adjustable for guaranteed comfort

name: The Multi-Purpose Deluxe BodyChoice Massage Table
description:
Designed to serve all kinds of bodywork and massage”
This latest Multi-Purpose Deluxe Massage Table by BodyChoice offers the very best quality-price ratio. The incredibly sturdy leg & frame systems are skillfully built with first-rate German birch, particularly designed to last for a lifetime. It is ergonomically constructed to provide you with a built-in face port for extra convenience in body positioning without an additional face cradle. As an added option to position your clients’ head in the most comfortable way possible for an unforgettable massage experience, an ergonomic adjustable headrest coupled with our famous, much-loved  memory face pillow is included.

•	Free Ergonomic Adjustable Headrest
•	Free Face Pillow

name: Classico BodyChoice Stationary Massage Table
description:
The newest Classico BodyChoice Stationary Massage Table is specially designed to not only meet, but surpass the highest demands of every professional bodyworker.

This handsome, luxurious, yet affordable, stationary massage table comes equipped with an innovative built-in pneumatic gas-lift system, offering you an extra backrest option. A numerous-position adjustment from flat top to nearly upright is silently smooth and incredibly effortless. This additional feature is ideal for a wide variety of treatments that require special support for your clients.

The cozy and restful upholstery is comprised of 2.5'' high-density, small-cell foam with the new environmentally and skin-friendly PU leather. This ensures maximum comfort for your clients while providing firm resilience during bodywork treatments.

Using our highly skilled craftsmanship and only the finest materials such as first-rate hardwood maple, the Classico BodyChoice stationary massage table is simply the best.

Specifications	Classico BodyChoice Stationary Massage Table
Width	30''
Length	73''

Padding	2.5" Small-High Density-Cell Foam, including 0.6" Memory Foam
Vinyl	Environmentally and Skin Friendly PU-Leather (Oil & Waterproof)
Leg & Frame	High Quality Hardwood (Maple)
System	Adjustable Backrest Option

name: Premier Massage Table
description:
Confidence, Comfort, and Convenience puts the Premier at the top of its class. The Premier massage table can be used for most modalities and is especially recommended for deep tissue work or vigorous styles such as thai massage, sports massage, and rolfing. The Power Lock Support System is the strongest on the market. The Box Beam reinforced table top lets you work as vigorously and deep as you want. The 3" deluxe foam system and 100% PU Soft Touch upholstery for maximum client comfort. Your getting the best portable massage table on the market.

Key Features:
• 1000 lb. Working Weight Capacity, 4000 lb Static Weight
• Width 31"
• 3" Deluxe Multi-Layer Foam System
• Weight: 39 lbs
• Height Range 23"-33" 
• Patented PowerLock Support System
• Box Beam reinforced table top
• Two-Knob Leg Extensions for extra stability
• Open Reiki Endplates
• 100% PU Soft Touch Covering in 6 colors Agate, Burgundy, Black, Purple, Royal Blue, and Teal
• Face rest outlets at both ends of table
• Limited Lifetime Warranty

name: Versatile BodyChoice Stationary
description:
The Versatile BodyChoice Stationary  is one of the most comfortable tables on the market. It is padded with 3 1/2" of soft foam and equipped with a face cradle, face cushion, natural wood legs with coating and additional nape-bolster for optimal convenience.

Its removable side arm rests adjust automatically, providing maximal client comfort and easing the work of the therapist. They are easy to remove, making the Versatile BodyChoice Stationary even more flexible in use. The arm sling for the client lying face down can also be set up easily.

The understructure of the table is set back from the table edges, providing better access and excellent body mechanics all the way around the table. The open storage shelf underneath the table puts tools you need at your fingertips.

Specifications	Versatile BodyChoice
Width	30''
Length	71''

System	Pneumatic power memory - automatically

Ten-Year Guarantee Against Defects of Legs & Frame

name: Standard Powerlift Electric Massage Table
description:
The elegant, ergonomically-designed PowerLift is the ultimate solution for every practitioner. The Ergonomic design is ideal for maintaining good body mechanics, providing ample room for the bodyworker while sitting or standing. Its efficient design means it is extremely reliable and suffers far fewer mechanical problems than other tables on the market.
The dual pedestal system provides extreme security to the tabletop. The whisper-quiet motor of the PowerLift effortlessly raises and lowers the table with smooth comfort. A foot pedal operates the motor, meaning you will not have to strain your own body by leaning over to operate the table. Included with the Standard PowerLift is an adjustable headrest and rounded, comfortable arm shelf. Four lockable casters mean that the table provides both mobility and stability.
 
Specifications	Standard Powerlift Electric Massage Table
Width	29''
Length	68''
Length with Headrest	79''
Adjustable Heights	20" - 38"
Weight	187 lbs
Static Weight	2,500 lbs
Lift Capacity	800 lbs Distributed Load
Padding	2.5" Fire Retardant Foam

Vinyl	PU-Leather Oil & Waterproof
System	Heavy Duty Steel Construction
Guarantee	Lifetime Structural Warranty, 5 years on Motors
Carton box	77" x 29" x 24" - 220lb

name: Cozy Deluxe Electric Lift
description:
The Cozy Deluxe takes the electric lift tables to a whole new level. Like the Cozy Flat, The Cozy Deluxe gives you the power to position your clients at exactly the right height with a touch of a pedal. The Cozy Deluxe, however, comes with the amazing air-pressure controlled backrest and leg rest which allow you to adjust your clients’ body in countless relaxing ways. 

Additionally, the Cozy Deluxe comes with adjustable and removable armrests. The super-comfy, super-sleek Cozy Deluxe massage table comes with a reliable electric lift actuator which makes adjusting the height of your table a breeze.  The three inches of Multi-Layer Soft Foam tabletop provides a supremely comfortable experience for your clients while the heavy-duty steel table frame ensures strength and stability. The tabletop is covered with Soft Touch Luxurious PU upholstery which is environmentally and skin friendly as well as oil and water resistant. For your convenience, there are outlets for headrests at both ends of the table. Durable polypropylene wheels allow for easy transportation. 

Specifications	Cozy Deluxe PowerLift Massage Table

PU-Leather (Oil & Waterproof)

name: Chiropractic PowerLift Electric Massage Table
description:
Chiropractors love this electric massage table because of its simple and straightforward operation, great variety of positions, two adjustable headrests, and because it offers the best price on the market.
The Ergonomic design is ideal for maintaining good body mechanics, providing ample room for the bodyworker while sitting or standing. The Quattro pedestal system provides extreme security to the tabletop. The whisper-quiet motor of the LiftBack PowerLift effortlessly raises and lowers the table with smooth comfort. Its efficient design means it is extremely reliable and suffers far fewer mechanical problems than other tables on the market.
Two foot pedals operates the motor, meaning you will not have to strain your own body by leaning over to operate the table. Four lockable casters mean that the table provides both mobility and stability. Removable arm wings are very helpful when you want to perform techniques while the client??s arms are above his or her head. Also included with the Chiropractic PowerLift is a comfortable, rounded arm shelf.

name: Hydrocollator E-1 Heating Unit
description:
Don't get heated up trying to find the perfect Hydrocollator! Durable and easy to maintain, this high quality stainless steel unit has almost indefinite life and ensures a constant supply of temperature consistent HotPacs.This ever so popular non-insulated model is smaller than the E-2, which makes it just right for small clinics and departments where oversize HotPacs are not used. It fits perfectly on a desktop, counter top or mobile stand. The E-1 Model is perfect for most massage therapy practices and comes with 4 standard size hot packs and an internal rack. No plumbing required. Thermostatically controlled temperature. Simply fill with water.
Includes:
•	E-1 Heating Unit 
•	4 standard size hot packs 
•	Internal rack 
Dimensions: 
•	16" x 13" x 8"  
Warranty: 
•	The manufacturer offers a 1 year limited warranty on this product.

name: Standard Professional Stone Warmer
description:
Standard Professional Stone Warmer maintains a constant even temperature, so your massage stones are always ready to use. This is an ideal unit for the facial massage stone set, or when the larger unit is simply too big to be convenient. Included items: pre set temperature setting, cool, touch handles 36 stone capacity
15" x 11 " x 7 "

name: Multi-Purpose Steamer
description: This multi-purpose steamer is specially made for use with Thai Herbal Compress Balls. The herbal ball steamer provides optimum temperature for heating the herbal compresses before and during treatments. It also comes with a multi-purpose basket with handle, tempered glass cover, and temperature control cord set.

name: Hand-Shaped Basalt Stones Set
description:
2 Super Big Stones (sacrum solar plexus)
12 big stones (back, legs)
18 middle stones (hands, arms)
8 small stones (forehead, neck, face)

Hand-Shaped Basalt Stones: All stones, rich in iron, are therapeutic basalt that preserves heat well. Every piece of this black volcanic rock is carefully and dexterously cut to the same shape in various sizes. Then, much more time of skillful labor is required to polish the stones to perfection particularly for stone massage therapy.

name: 38 Piece Stone Set
description:
This set is perfect for the therapist who provides mobile treatments and needs portability, as well as international clients who want to keep size, weight and shipping expense down.
8 spinal
2 large
4 medium
8 small
4 facial
8 toe
1 pillow / neck
1 contour
2 trigger point

name: 50 Piece Stone Set
description:
While not as complete as the 66 pc set, it is designed to include the stones that an intermediate to advanced massage therapist will need to give a relaxing and effective hot stone treatment. This set has just the right amount of large stone mixed with other specialty stone to access those hard to reach contours.
8 spinal
8 large
8 medium
8 small
4 facial 
8 toe
1 pillow / neck
1 contour
2 trigger point
2 palm / gluteal

name: 66 Piece Stone Set
description:
This set is truly complete, including every stone a massage therapist would need to treat the entire body. It includes the large, heavy belly / sacral stones as well as those specialty tools needed for the hands, feet, neck and hard to reach contours. It is configured to equip the needs of the beginner or the advanced massage therapist for any hot stone treatment.
2 palm/gluteal
1 sacral
8 spinal
8 large
8 medium
8 small
8 facial 
6 finger
1 pillow / neck
8 toe
2 contour
4 trigger point
2 foot

name: Hot Massage Sea Shells
description:
Just imagine combining the exfoliation of a salt glow and the heat of a stone massage with the beauty of the sea. These beautiful shells are filled with cement and sealed to maximize heat retention and then smoothed and coated with 3 coats of commercial-grade resin to provide a mildly exfoliating treatment. 

Heat them in a water bath in your stone roaster and then place them strategically on the patient to begin a warm transfer of heat. Add your favorite cream, lotion or oil and alternate massaging your client with your hands together with the shells as a massage tool. Each shell will retain heat for up to 20 minutes. 

These all natural shells of varied colors and sizes deliver deep therapeutic sensations of comfort and warmth. This kit contains approximately 30 beautiful shells, enough for a 60 minute massage, and an instruction book. 

Features: 
Provides deep relaxation 
Increases circulation, lymph, and vitality 
Promotes the release of toxins 
Irons out tight muscles 
Relieves sinus pressure 
Gently exfoliates the skin

Please use caution while working with shells as heat can cause injury if instructions are not followed properly. This items is intended for use by a trained massage therapists ONLY.

name: Massage Tool Set
description: This massage tool set is a combination of the Therapeutic and Healing Massage Sets (from left to right, top to bottom):  Thera Cane, Massage Knobble, Palm Urchin, Glow Fingers, Relax Hammer, Thera Press, Handy Brush, Magnetic Head Trip, Therapists Thumb, and Massage Roller.

name: Digital Massage Table Warmer
description:
A great addition to your portable or stationary massage table, this full sized table warmer provides safe, even warmth from one end of the massage table to the other. We all know that effective bodywork needs to begin with a relaxed warm body, and being able to rest comfortably on this massage table warmer helps your client disconnect from the world. Elastic bands hold the table warmer securely to your massage table to avoid slipping. The new digitally adjustable heat settings allow you to customize the heat for optimized client comfort. During those cool months, this table warmer feels incredibly snuggly and comforting - your clients will love it!

This table warmer is designed to provide gentle warmth to your clients during their treatment. After preheating your Digital Massage Table Warmer, the warmth will be evident when lying on top of the pad, under table linens. The pad does not feel hot to the touch.

Features:
•	Both temperature and time are controlled by the digital LCD unit for safety, precision and reliability. 
•	Maximum internal temperature of 135 degrees 
•	Timer Setting up to 99 minutes. 
•	9 foot cord  
Specifications:
•	Dimensions: 30" x 72" 
•	Voltage: 115 V 
•	Current: 0.76 A 
•	Wattage: 92W 
•	Warranty: 1 year 

Operating Instructions:
•	Unfold the digital Massage Table Warmer and lay it flat on your table. DO NOT OPERATE THE UNIT FOLDED OR BUNCHED UP.  
•	Dress your massage table with linens appropriate for your climate and season. The digital Massage Table Warmer should be placed on top of your table, followed by a fitted sheet or a fitted fleece table pad, then your flat sheet and blanket. This table dressing will help retain the warmth on your massage table.  
•	Preheat your digital Massage Table Warmer by turning the unit up to the highest temperature. Adjust the temperature to meet the client's preference before the treatment begins. Be sure to check the temperature with your client during the treatment. 
•	The table warmer will only work properly when covered with appropriate sheeting or a fitted fleece pad. This holds the warmth rather than letting it dissipate into the room. 
•	Unplug the table warmer when it is not in use. After the digital Massage Table Warmer has cooled completely, it may be loosely folded or rolled up for storage. Do not fold or roll tightly as this will damage the wiring and void your warranty. 
FAILURE TO FOLLOW THESE INSTRUCTIONS WILL VOID YOUR WARRANTY AND COULD LEAD TO SERIOUS INJURY, OVERHEATING OR FIRE.
Caution:	
•	This warmer does not have three prongs - only two standard prongs. Three prongs are necessary for hospital use. 
•	Do not use excessive padding over the table warmer such as egg-crate pads, foam rubber tops, etc. 
•	Do not leave pillows, bolsters, or other thick insulating objects laying on the table over the warmer. 
•	Do not place the controller by outside heating sources such as heaters, lamps, windows, vents, etc. 
•	Do not use the warmer with infants, children, invalids, or people who cannot control the device by sensing the heat and adjusting it themselves. 
•	Do not sleep on the device.

name: Standard Warming Pad or Fleece Warming Pad
description:
One of the most common complaints heard by bodyworkers, especially when the client first gets into position on their massage table, is how cold the table's surface feels on the client's bare skin. This pad can rapidly eliminate that problem. This massage warming pads are 68 inches by 26 inches. Because it is comfortable and soft to the skin, it can be used during the massage, as well as before, to heat up the table's surface.

1. Unfold and lay your warming pad flat on the table, strap side down. The controller and cord should hang down the head end of table.
2. To secure the warming pad to the table, slide each of the elastic straps around its respective corner of the table.
3. Remove and folds or bunching in the warming pad before using it.
Note: Both standard and fleece warming pads have standard 110 voltage.

Choose between standard warming pad or fleece warming pad for $99.00 each.

name: Lavender Health Kit
description:
The Lavender Health Kit includes a U-Shaped Shoulder Pad, Black Belt (Lumbar Pad), Eye Shade, and Mini Pad.  Each pad has a beige fleece covering and is filled with buckwheat and lavender.  All of these pads combine the therapeutic effects of aromatherapy with the benefits of heat and cold.

Health Benefits
When Used Hot:                                         When Used Cold:
Relieves muscles aches and pains      Relieves pain due to injured muscles
Relieves minor burns                               Relieves minor burns and bruises
Relieves minor joint pain                         Relieves minor headaches
Relieves menstrual cramps                    Reduces swelling and fever
Relieves minor headaches                     Promotes muscle relaxation
Reduces stiffness

Lavender Eye Shade Pad
The Lavender Eye Shade Pad is specially designed for headache relief.  It fits easily over the face and is secured comfortably with a strap.  Used cold, the eye shade reduces puffiness around the eyes as well as soothes migraine and sinus headaches.  It can also be used to relieve pain from an earache.    
Specifications
Measurements:  16cm X 9cm
Weight:  150g

Lavender Mini Pillow
The Lavender Mini Pillow is just the right size to be used almost anywhere on the body.  When used hot, it can be tucked into the small of the back to relieve lower back pain and works wonders on stomach cramps.  When used cold, it helps promote muscle relaxation, alleviates headaches, and reduces fever and swelling.   The aroma of lavender eliminates stress and helps overcome insomnia.
Specifications
Measurements:  16cm x 10cm
Weight:  150g

Lavender U-Shaped Shoulder Pad
The Lavender U-Shaped Shoulder Pad works well to relieve aches, pains, tension and arthritis in the neck and shoulders.  Luxurious and soft, the U-shaped design drapes over the neck and shoulder to provide ultimate comfort.  The aroma of lavender eliminates stress and helps overcome insomnia.  Specifications
Measurements:  45cm x 27cm
Weight:  800g

Lavender Black Belt (Lumbar Pad)
The Lavender Black Belt is specifically designed to comfortably strap onto the lower back and abdomen and provide temporary pain relief.  The soothing aroma of its natural ingredients helps relieve stress and promote overall wellness.  It is easy to use and has a removable, washable polar fleece cover.  
Specifications
Measurements:  45cm x 13cm
Weight:  450g

Instructions for Use
To use as heat pads:
Sprinkle with water and heat in the microwave for two to three minutes.  To avoid burning, it is necessary to check the pads every 30 seconds while heating.
To use as cold pads:
Place pads in a plastic sealable bags and put in the freezer for 1 to 2 hours.  The pads will stay cold, dry and flexible for approximately 30 minutes after removing from freezer.

To Clean
Wipe the pads with damp cloth and lay flat to dry.

Storage Method
When not in use, allow the pads to air dry and return to room temperature and then place them in a tightly sealed container.

Caution
Be careful when handling the pads when hot.
Always test the temperature of the pads on forearm before using on the body.
Keep in mind that people’s heat tolerances vary especially the young and elderly.  
After microwaving the pads, gently knead to evenly distribute heat.
Do not microwave the pads when they are completely dry or they will burn.
Do not heat pads in the oven.
Always remove packaging before heating.
Apply directly to the body, do not wrap up.
If the pads show signs of burning or being overcooked, place them on a noncombustible surface, allow them to cool and discard.
Do not use as bed warmers when sleeping.

name: Herbal Compress Lavender
description:
The Lavender Compress Ball uses heat and aromatherapy together to provide the ultimate in relaxation for your clients or yourself.  This unique ball is made of the deliciously scented lavender flower and buckwheat wrapped up in clean, white cotton.  It can be used in conjunction with massage or acupressure to increase energy flow, improve circulation, relax muscles and stimulate nerves.

Health Benefits
Relief from headaches, sinus issues, and colds
Reduction of fatigue and stress
Stimulation of internal organs
Improvement of blood circulation
Promotion of skin cell growth
Relief from arthritis
Relief from chronic back pain
Treatment of sprains
Reduction in pain associated with bruises
Relief from insomnia

Specifications
Measurements:  8.5cm x 14cm
Weight:  200g

Instructions for Heating
For the first use:  Soak the compress in hot or boiling water for 1-2 minutes.  Next, steam the compress in a steamer for 5-20 minutes.  Alternatively, place in the microwave for a minute or two to heat to desired temperature.
For subsequent uses:  Moisten the compress bag with water and steam it in a steamer for 5-20 minutes or place in the microwave for a minute or two.

name: Magic Warmer
description:
This innovate product uses heat therapy to treat sore, stiff muscles anywhere on the body.  The unique liquid inside heats up to 130°F almost instantaneously as it crystallizes.  There’s no need for batteries or electricity.  And what’s more, this pack is reusable!  The Magic Warmer is covered with PVC and is completely portable.  It’s wonderful to use while traveling or at home and it’s easy to clean.

Dimensions:
7.6"x11"(19.2cm x 28.8cm)

Directions for Use:  
To activate pack, simply “push” the metal button inside.  Gel will crystallize and pack will heat up.  To reuse, fill a pot with enough water to cover the pack and heat until boiling.  Place a cloth at the bottom of pot and submerge pack into boiling water.  Simmer pack until all crystals have been converted back to liquid (usually around 10 minutes).  Liquid should be clear, not cloudy.  Remove from water and let dry.

Caution:
Always test temperature of heat pack before placing directly on skin.  Use care when inserting or removing pack from boiling water.

name: Magic Warmer Shoulder Pack
description:
This innovate product uses heat therapy to treat sore, stiff muscles on the neck and shoulders.  The unique liquid inside heats up to 130°F almost instantaneously as it crystallizes.  There’s no need for batteries or electricity.  And what’s more, this pack is reusable!  The Shoulder and Neck Instant Hot Reusable Pack is covered with PVC and is completely portable.  It’s wonderful to use while traveling or at home and it’s easy to clean.

Dimensions:
8.5"x 16"

Directions for Use:  
To activate pack, simply “push” the metal button inside.  Gel will crystallize and pack will heat up.  To reuse, fill a pot with enough water to cover the pack and heat until boiling.  Place a cloth at the bottom of pot and submerge pack into boiling water.  Simmer pack until all crystals have been converted back to liquid (usually around 10 minutes).  Liquid should be clear, not cloudy.  Remove from water and let dry.

Caution:
Always test temperature of heat pack before placing directly on skin.  Use with care when inserting or removing pack from boiling water.

name: Instant Hot Compress & Instant Cold Compress
description:
Instant Hot Compress 
This compress provides single-use heat on its own after activation. It is convenient and portable. Use whenever and wherever hot therapy is needed.

Usage: Simply squeeze the pouch to activate it. It can reach a high temperature of 130o F / 54o C and last approximately 15-30 minutes. 

Size: 6'' x 10''

Instant Cold Compress
This pouch provides single-use cold application without the drippy mess of ice cubes. No refrigeration is needed. It is convenient and portable. Use whenever and wherever cold therapy is needed. It is primarily used for outdoor activity injuries and first aid.

Usage: Simply squeeze the pouch to activate it.  The pouch contents cool to 25o F / -4o C immediately and remain cold 15-40 minutes. 

Size: 6'' x 10''

The $9.99 price includes 1 Hot & 1 Cold compress.

name: Delux Hot and Cold Therapy Set
description:
Hot and cold therapy is an effective way to treat acute or chronic pain.  From one-time use packs to reusable compresses, the Hot and Cold Therapy Set is designed to suit anyone’s hot and cold therapy needs.  These compresses and packs offer an easy, quick, mess-free, and portable way to apply heat and cold to virtually anywhere on the body.
The Hot and Cold Therapy Set includes:
1 Standard Reusable Hot/Cold Gel Pack
1 Deluxe Reusable Hot/Cold Gel Pack
1 Instant Hot Compress
1 Instant Cold Compress
1 Magic Warmer
1 Ice Bag
Picture:  From left to right, top to bottom:  Deluxe Reusable Hot/Cold Gel Pack (shown with packaging), Instant Hot Compress (shown with packaging), Instant Cold Compress (shown with packaging), Magic Warmer, Standard Reusable Hot/Cold Gel Pack, and Ice Bag (shown empty and filled with ice).

name: BodyChoice Aroma Diffuser
description:
The BodyChoice Aroma Diffuser fills your home with healing moisture and a pleasing scent of your choice.   The cool moisture from the Aroma Diffuser works wonders for congestion, sinus infections, and dry lips, nose, eyes and skin.  Relax in the therapeutic effects of aromatherapy by adding just a couple drops of your favorite essential oil to the Aroma Diffuser.

The Aroma Diffuser allows you to choose a low, medium, or high mist setting.  It also comes with an LED light that emits soothing colors.  Select either a single stationary color or the changing, multi-color option.  Works well as a nightlight!

This 7.3x3.9x3.7in diffuser runs for up to eight hours with a single fill.  When the water level runs low, the “stop” light will flash and the mist operation will also automatically stop.  Uses little electricity.

The BodyChoice Aroma Diffuser can be used in the home or office and looks great anywhere! 

This appliance is warranted for one year from date of purchase against defects in material and workmanship.

name: Set of 2 Candle Scent Burners
description:
Add a touch of Chinese culture to your décor!   Our set of two beautiful Candle Burners, along with tea light candles and your favorite scented oils are all you need to fill your home with fragrance and elegance.  The carvings on these exquisite ceramic candle burners are done by hand.  Watch beautiful shadows dance across your room as the tea lights glow through the carvings.

Dimensions:  
Altar Candle Burner:  10.5cm x 11.3cm
Egg-Shaped Candle Burner:  4.8cm x 10cm x 12.3cm

Directions for use:  
Fill oil well with your favorite scented oil.  Place an unscented tea light with wick standing straight up into the candle compartment.  Light tea light candle and enjoy!

Caution:  
Keep Candle Burners in an open area away from anything flammable.  Ensure there is a sufficient amount of oil in the oil well when in use.  Only use tea light candles.  Never leave Candle Burner unattended.

Tea light candles and scented oil not included.

name: Deluxe Flannel Massage Sheet Set
description:
There is nothing like luxurious soft cotton flannel sheets to make for a great massage experience and these sheet sets are designed for comfort, fit and extended use. These soft sheet sets offer an increased size on all pieces. The additional depth, width and length will fit any massage table that we know of, even with the use of a thick fleece table pad or table warmer. The face rest cover design has also been modified to allow for the extra thickness of a fleece face rest pad. The generously oversized fitted and flat sheets fit massage tables measuring up to 33 inches wide. You and your clients will appreciate the oversized flat sheet, allowing plenty of coverage during massage including those prone to supine transitions. The fitted sheet features a tight elastic edge to ensure a great fit for your massage table. The sheets have a 170 thread count. The soft, double-brushed medium-weight flannel material is appropriate for massage in the summer as well as the winter and withstands repeated rough washings. These sheets are available in a new variety of beautiful colors to match any massage or spa decor.
We genuinely feel that these are the best massage table sheets on the planet!

Sheet Dimensions:
Fitted Massage Table Sheet (7" drop - 36" x 77")
Flat Massage Table Sheet ( 63" x 100")
Face Cradle Cover (15" x 6")
Sheets are 160 GSM 

Cleaning Instructions:
Wash in warm water
Use mild detergent
Tumble dry on low heat

description:

name: Spa Apron With Biotone Logo
description: Embroidered BIOTONE SPA logo brings professionalism to your business. Adjustable snap neck closer, and two convenient front pockets. V-Cut. Available in black. 65% polyester / 35% cotton
